thread.title: OnePlus X could be the stylish budget phone you're looking for
thread.title_full: OnePlus X could be the stylish budget phone you're looking for

title: OnePlus X could be the stylish budget phone you're looking for
text:
11:22   Twitter Share on Google+ The OnePlus X's launch price has been leaked ahead of the phone's unveiling this week - and it's looking like another wallet-friendly offering.An advert for the handset posted on Chinese social network Weibo lists it with a 1,699 yuan price tag, which converts to around £174 or $267. 
© Weibo Coming in black and white colours with a glass-backed, iPhone-like design, the device is understood to be geared towards fashion-conscious users who are less concerned about specs.However, rumours suggest that a capable Qualcomm Snapdragon 801 processor and 2GB of RAM will power the handset, while its 5-inch display is 1080p-ready.Cameras are said to clock in at 13 megapixels on the rear and 8 megapixels on the front, with 16GB of memory and SD card support to store your photos on.OnePlus will take the wrappings off the phone this Thursday (October 29), and we'll be on hand to cover the announcement.
